channel.title: Daily Rosary
channel.description: Welcome to the Daily Rosary Web App! The Daily Rosary is a web application designed to display the daily Rosary mystery automatically. Install it from your browser and listen to prayers hands-free.
channel.author: Eric Kouassi
channel.summary: Your companion for daily Rosary prayers, providing the mystery of the day with ease and convenience.

episodes.title: Monday Rosary ‚Äî The Joyful Mysteries
episodes.description: Join us this Monday for a serene meditation on the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary, celebrating Christ‚Äôs arrival and God‚Äôs humble love.
episodes.author: XP-DEVOTION
episodes.subtitle: A simple, peaceful way to begin your week in prayer.
episodes.summary: A peaceful Monday Rosary reflecting on the Joyful Mysteries, helping you begin the week with gratitude, hope, and quiet devotion.

episodes.title: Tuesday Rosary ‚Äî The Sorrowful Mysteries
episodes.description: Join us this Tuesday for a heartfelt meditation on the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary, entering into Christ‚Äôs passion and the depth of His love: 1) The Agony in the Garden 2) The Scourging at the Pillar 3) The Crowning with Thorns 4) The Carrying of the Cross 5) The Crucifixion These mysteries invite us to contemplate Christ‚Äôs suffering, the cost of redemption, and the mercy offered to all. Deepen your prayer experience with the Daily Rosary website: https://dailyrosary.cf/ ‚Äî featuring audio guidance and a listening streak tracker to support your spiritual journey.
episodes.author: XP-DEVOTION
episodes.subtitle: A quiet space to enter Christ‚Äôs suffering with honesty, trust, and love.

episodes.title: Wednesday Rosary ‚Äî The Glorious Mysteries
episodes.description: Join us this Wednesday as we pray the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary, celebrating Christ‚Äôs triumph and the hope poured out upon the world: 1) The Resurrection 2) The Ascension 3) The Descent of the Holy Spirit 4) The Assumption 5) The Coronation of Mary.
episodes.author: XP-DEVOTION
episodes.subtitle: A moment to rejoice in Christ‚Äôs victory and the hope He offers.
episodes.summary: A peaceful Wednesday Rosary reflecting on the Glorious Mysteries, inviting you into Christ‚Äôs triumph with clarity and joy.

episodes.title: Thursday Rosary ‚Äî The Luminous Mysteries
episodes.description: Join us this Thursday as we meditate on the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary, contemplating the public ministry of Christ and the light He brings into the world.
episodes.author: XP-DEVOTION
episodes.subtitle: A prayerful reflection on the light Christ brings to the world.
episodes.summary: A gentle Thursday Rosary praying through the Luminous Mysteries, helping you reflect on Christ‚Äôs ministry with peace and focus.

episodes.description: Join us this Friday as we return to the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary, entering more deeply into Christ‚Äôs Passion and the love that led Him to the Cross.
episodes.author: XP-DEVOTION
episodes.subtitle: A quiet return to Christ‚Äôs Passion with reverence and trust.
episodes.summary: A reflective Friday Rosary praying the Sorrowful Mysteries, offering space to meditate on Christ‚Äôs sacrifice with depth and peace.

episodes.title: Saturday Rosary ‚Äî The Joyful Mysteries
episodes.description: Join us this Saturday as we pray the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary, celebrating the beginnings of salvation and the humble love of God revealed through Mary.

episodes.subtitle: A gentle return to the Joyful Mysteries and God‚Äôs humble love.

episodes.title: Sunday Rosary ‚Äî The Glorious Mysteries

episodes.title: Sunday Rosary ‚Äî The Joyful Mysteries (Advent)
episodes.description: During the holy season of Advent, the Church invites us to reflect on the Joyful Mysteries each Sunday, preparing our hearts for the coming of Christ.
episodes.author: XP-DEVOTION
episodes.subtitle: A season of joyful expectation as we await Christ‚Äôs coming.
episodes.summary: A peaceful Advent Sunday Rosary reflecting on the Joyful Mysteries, inviting you into hope, anticipation, and quiet devotion.

episodes.title: Sunday Rosary ‚Äî The Joyful Mysteries (Christmas Season)
episodes.description: During the Christmas season, the Church prays the Joyful Mysteries on Sundays, celebrating the birth of Christ and the radiant love revealed in the Incarnation.
episodes.author: XP-DEVOTION
episodes.subtitle: A celebration of Christ‚Äôs birth through the Joyful Mysteries.
episodes.summary: A Christmas-season Sunday Rosary reflecting on the Joyful Mysteries, inviting you into wonder, gratitude, and quiet devotion.

episodes.title: Sunday Rosary ‚Äî The Sorrowful Mysteries (Lent)
episodes.description: During the penitential season of Lent, the Church prays the Sorrowful Mysteries on Sundays, entering deeply into Christ‚Äôs Passion and the mercy poured out for our salvation: 1) The Agony in the Garden 2) The Scourging at the Pillar 3) The Crowning with Thorns 4) The Carrying of the Cross 5) The Crucifixion Let these mysteries draw you into repentance, compassion, and renewed trust in God‚Äôs love. Pray along with the Daily Rosary website: https://dailyrosary.cf/ ‚Äî featuring peaceful audio guidance and a listening streak tracker for your Lenten journey. üôè‚ú®
